p: This is a descriptive observational epidemiological study that used dengue notification data from the National Surveillance System, considering the entire historical series from January 1990 to December 2017, available in the Epidemiological Bulletins and publications of the Brazilian Ministry of Health. Population data used to calculate incidence were obtained from the website of the Brazilian Institute of Geography and Statistics ( Instituto Brasileiro de Geografia e Estatística–IBGE) [ 21].
